system.description:
One object you touch up to the size of a horse becomes powerfully magnetized.

It attracts all smaller magnetic objects within near.

If it can move, it is pulled toward larger magnetic objects within near. A metal creature must pass a STR check equal to your spellcasting check to resist.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.spell-effects.Item.LyVUb5XbziOGsLXM]{Spell Effect: Magnetize}
